title: Madeleine West mocks yuppies who move to Byron Bay
text:
Madeleine West has mocked city types who move to Byron Bay, after relocating to the coastal town herself earlier this year.

The actress, who previously lived in Melbourne, told The Kyle and Jackie O Show on Wednesday that Byron Bay is filled with wannabes now.

'The thing I laugh about is the people who come from big cities to Byron and suddenly start "being Byron",' she said.

Mocking: Madeleine West has mocked Byron Bay yuppies in a new interview with The Kyle and Jackie O Show this week

The 39-year-old explained that these people wear contrived bohemian outfits while actual Byron Bay locals just wear T-shirts and shorts.

'They have the perfect hair, the perfect outfit and the perfect makeup,' she added.

Madeleine is busy promoting the second season of Channel 10's Playing for Keeps, which follows the private lives of a Melbourne footy team and the players' wives.

Wannabes: The actress said that Byron Bay is filled with people who try too hard to 'be Byron'

The popular series returns to Channel 10 on Wednesday, October 16.

When she's not working as an actress, the mother-of-six is busy focusing on charity work with the Asylum Seeker Resource Centre in Melbourne.

Earlier this year, she told WHO magazine that her dedication to her charity work was keeping her away from her young children.

'They have the perfect hair, the perfect outfit and the perfect makeup': She said these people wear contrived bohemian outfits while the Byron Bay locals just wear shorts and a T-shirt

Madeleine shares five daughters and one son with her ex-partner, celebrity chef and MasterChef guest judge Shannon Bennett.

She told the publication: 'I hope my kids acknowledge that in my imperfectly perfect way, I'm striving to be the best parent that I can be for them'.

The actress also visited Morocco with her eldest daughter Phoenix, where they saw girls as young as 13 being married off to much older men.

'It really hit home, seeing my daughter - who in so many ways is still such a child - and there are girls her age and younger who are entering marriage,' she said.
description: Madeleine West has mocked city types who move to Byron Bay, after relocating to the coastal town herself earlier this year.
